meaningMnemonic: You grab a <radical>tree</radical> so you can reach the <radical>bar</radical> in the ocean by making a <kanji>jetty</kanji> or a <kanji>pier</kanji> to it. Now you can walk out on the jetty and go get drinks without needing a boat or getting wet.
readingMnemonic: You also made this <kanji>jetty</kanji> so it would be easier for <reading>San</reading>ta-san (さん) to dock his sleigh. Oh, you didn't know? His sleigh is more of a speed boat now, and he wants a refreshing drink after delivering all those presents. You get extra presents for making him a jetty, so win-win.
